document_title: Vaginitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: viem-am-dao.json_10_Complete treatment of vaginal infections at the Obstetrics and Gynecology Center, Tam Anh General Hospital
subsection_content:
Gathering experienced experts and investing in modern machinery systems, the Center for Obstetrics and Gynecology at Tam Anh General Hospital was born with the goal of comprehensive gynecological health care for women. This place provides examination, consultation and treatment services for gynecological diseases, in addition to vaginitis, also cervical ectropion, uterine fibroids, endometriosis, menstrual disorders, and glandular diseases. breast…
Using condoms is an effective way to prevent sexually transmitted diseases
To find out information, schedule an examination and treatment of gynecological diseases at the Obstetrics and Gynecology Center, Tam Anh General Hospital, you can call hotline 024 3872 3872 - 024 7106 6858 (Hanoi), 0287 102 6789 - 093 180 6858 (HCMC) or text Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage.
108 Hoang Nhu Tiep Street, Bo De Ward, Long Bien District, Hanoi City; 2B Pho Quang, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Vaginitis is a "hard to talk about" disease for women. Therefore, you need to proactively get examined when symptoms appear, or proactively have gynecological examinations every 6 months to detect the disease early and receive complete treatment.
